enumeratedValues.name: GINT_0
enumeratedValues.description: Global interrupt request is not asserted.

enumeratedValues.name: ENET1_CLK_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: ENET1 TX reference clock driven by ref_enetpll. This clock is also output to pins via the IOMUX. ENET_REF_CLK1 function.

enumeratedValues.name: ENET1_CLK_SEL_1
enumeratedValues.description: Gets ENET1 TX reference clock from the ENET1_TX_CLK pin. In this use case, an external OSC provides the clock for both the external PHY and the internal controller.

enumeratedValues.name: ENET2_CLK_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: ENET2 TX reference clock driven by ref_enetpll. This clock is also output to pins via the IOMUX. ENET2_REF_CLK function.

enumeratedValues.name: ENET2_CLK_SEL_1
enumeratedValues.description: Gets ENET2 TX reference clock from the ENET2_TX_CLK pin. In this use case, an external OSC provides the clock for both the external PHY and the internal controller.

fields.name: EXC_MON
fields.description: Exclusive monitor response select of illegal command

fields.name: ENET_IPG_CLK_S_EN
fields.description: ENET and ENET2 ipg_clk_s clock gating enable

enumeratedValues.name: ENET_IPG_CLK_S_EN_0
enumeratedValues.description: ipg_clk_s is gated when there is no IPS access

fields.name: CM7_FORCE_HCLK_EN
fields.description: Arm CM7 platform AHB clock enable

enumeratedValues.name: CM7_FORCE_HCLK_EN_0
enumeratedValues.description: AHB clock is not running (gated) when CM7 is sleeping and TCM is not accessible.

enumeratedValues.name: CM7_FORCE_HCLK_EN_1
enumeratedValues.description: AHB clock is running (enabled) when CM7 is sleeping and TCM is accessible.

fields.name: AXBS_L_AHBXL_HIGH_PRIORITY
fields.description: AXBS_L AHBXL master has higher priority.Do not set both DMA and AHBXL to high priority.

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_L_AHBXL_HIGH_PRIORITY_0
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_L AHBXL master does not have high priority

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_L_AHBXL_HIGH_PRIORITY_1
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_P AHBXL master has high priority

fields.name: AXBS_L_DMA_HIGH_PRIORITY
fields.description: AXBS_L DMA master has higher priority.Do not set both DMA and AHBXL to high priority.

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_L_DMA_HIGH_PRIORITY_0
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_L DMA master does not have high priority

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_L_DMA_HIGH_PRIORITY_1
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_L DMA master has high priority

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_L_FORCE_ROUND_ROBIN_0
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_L masters are not arbitored in round robin, depending on DMA and AHBXL master priority settings.

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_L_FORCE_ROUND_ROBIN_1
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_L masters are arbitored in round robin

fields.name: AXBS_P_M0_HIGH_PRIORITY
fields.description: AXBS_P M0 master has higher priority.Do not set both M1 and M0 to high priority.

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_P_M0_HIGH_PRIORITY_0
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_P M0 master doesn't have high priority

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_P_M0_HIGH_PRIORITY_1
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_P M0 master has high priority

fields.name: AXBS_P_M1_HIGH_PRIORITY
fields.description: AXBS_P M1 master has higher priority.Do not set both M1 and M0 to high priority.

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_P_M1_HIGH_PRIORITY_0
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_P M1 master does not have high priority

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_P_M1_HIGH_PRIORITY_1
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_P M1 master has high priority

fields.name: AXBS_P_FORCE_ROUND_ROBIN
fields.description: Force Round Robin in AXBS_P. This bit can override master M0 M1 high priority configuration.

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_P_FORCE_ROUND_ROBIN_0
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_P masters are not arbitored in round robin, depending on M0/M1 master priority settings.

enumeratedValues.name: AXBS_P_FORCE_ROUND_ROBIN_1
enumeratedValues.description: AXBS_P masters are arbitored in round robin

fields.name: L2_MEM_EN_POWERSAVING
fields.description: enable power saving features on L2 memory

enumeratedValues.name: L2_MEM_EN_POWERSAVING_0
enumeratedValues.description: none memory power saving features enabled, SHUTDOWN/DEEPSLEEP/LIGHTSLEEP will have no effect

enumeratedValues.name: L2_MEM_EN_POWERSAVING_1
enumeratedValues.description: memory power saving features enabled, set SHUTDOWN/DEEPSLEEP/LIGHTSLEEP (priority high to low) to enable power saving levels

fields.name: RAM_AUTO_CLK_GATING_EN
fields.description: Automatically gate off RAM clock when RAM is not accessed.

enumeratedValues.name: RAM_AUTO_CLK_GATING_EN_0
enumeratedValues.description: disable automatically gate off RAM clock

enumeratedValues.name: RAM_AUTO_CLK_GATING_EN_1
enumeratedValues.description: enable automatically gate off RAM clock

fields.name: L2_MEM_DEEPSLEEP
fields.description: control how memory enter Deep Sleep mode (shutdown periphery power, but maintain memory contents, outputs of memory are pulled low)

enumeratedValues.name: L2_MEM_DEEPSLEEP_0
enumeratedValues.description: no force sleep control supported, memory deep sleep mode only entered when whole system in stop mode

enumeratedValues.name: L2_MEM_DEEPSLEEP_1
enumeratedValues.description: force memory into deep sleep mode

fields.name: MQS_CLK_DIV
fields.description: Divider ratio control for mclk from hmclk. mclk frequency = 1/(n+1) * hmclk frequency.

fields.name: MQS_OVERSAMPLE
fields.description: Used to control the PWM oversampling rate compared with mclk.

fields.name: OCRAM_CTL
fields.description: OCRAM_CTL[3] - write address pipeline control bit

fields.name: DCP_KEY_SEL
fields.description: Select 128-bit dcp key from 256-bit key from SNVS Master Key

enumeratedValues.name: DCP_KEY_SEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: Select [127:0] from SNVS Master Key as dcp key

enumeratedValues.name: DCP_KEY_SEL_1
enumeratedValues.description: Select [255:128] from SNVS Master Key as dcp key

fields.name: OCRAM2_CTL
fields.description: OCRAM2_CTL[3] - write address pipeline control bit

fields.name: OCRAM_STATUS
fields.description: This field shows the OCRAM pipeline settings status, controlled by OCRAM_CTL bits respectively

fields.name: OCRAM2_STATUS
fields.description: This field shows the OCRAM2 pipeline settings status, controlled by OCRAM2_CTL bits respectively

fields.name: AXBS_L_HALTED
fields.description: This bit shows the status of axbs_l

enumeratedValues.name: EDMA_STOP_ACK_1
enumeratedValues.description: EDMA stop acknowledge is asserted (EDMA is in STOP mode).

enumeratedValues.description: CAN1 stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: CAN2_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: CAN2 stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: TRNG_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: TRNG stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: ENET_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: ENET1 stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: SAI1_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: SAI1 stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: SAI2_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: SAI2 stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: SAI3_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: SAI3 stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: ENET2_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: ENET2 stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: SEMC_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: SEMC stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: PIT_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: PIT stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXSPI_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXSPI stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXIO1_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXIO1 stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXIO2_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXIO2 stop acknowledge is not asserted

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXIO2_STOP_ACK_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXIO2 stop acknowledge is asserted (FLEXIO2 is in STOP mode)

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXIO3_STOP_ACK_0

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXSPI2_STOP_ACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXSPI2 stop acknowledge is not asserted

fields.name: GPT2_CAPIN1_SEL
fields.description: GPT2 input capture channel 1 source select

enumeratedValues.name: GPT2_CAPIN1_SEL_1
enumeratedValues.description: source from ENET_1588_EVENT3_OUT (chnnal 3 of IEEE 1588 timer)

fields.name: GPT2_CAPIN2_SEL

fields.name: SEC_ERR_RESP
fields.description: Security error response enable for all security gaskets (on both AHB and AXI buses)

enumeratedValues.name: DCPKEY_OCOTP_OR_KEYMUX_0
enumeratedValues.description: Select key from SNVS Master Key.

enumeratedValues.name: OCRAM_TZ_EN_0
enumeratedValues.description: The TrustZone feature is disabled. Entire OCRAM space is available for all access types (secure/non-secure/user/supervisor).

enumeratedValues.name: OCRAM_TZ_EN_1
enumeratedValues.description: The TrustZone feature is enabled. Access to address in the range specified by [ENDADDR:STARTADDR] follows the execution mode access policy described in CSU chapter.

fields.name: LOCK_DCPKEY_OCOTP_OR_KEYMUX
fields.description: Lock DCP Key OCOTP/Key MUX selection bit

fields.name: BEE_DE_RX_EN
fields.description: BEE data decryption of memory region-n (n = 3 to 0)

fields.name: FLEXIO1_IPG_STOP_MODE

enumeratedValues.description: FlexIO1 is functional in Stop mode.

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXIO1_IPG_STOP_MODE_1
enumeratedValues.description: When this bit is equal to 1'b1 and ipg_stop is asserted, FlexIO1 is not functional in Stop mode.

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXIO1_IPG_DOZE_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXIO1 is not in doze mode

enumeratedValues.name: FLEXIO2_IPG_DOZE_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXIO2 is not in doze mode
